body_html:
@neerajprad This error only happens if cmake finds mkl but not mkl headers.

The header files are unfortunately not there. I can see the following commands in the Dockerfile. So maybe we just need to copy the header files in the include directory and put them here?

# MKL
RUN mkdir -p /opt/intel/lib
COPY mkl_libs/libmkl_core.a /opt/intel/lib/libmkl_core.a
COPY mkl_libs/libmkl_gnu_thread.a /opt/intel/lib/libmkl_gnu_thread.a
COPY mkl_libs/libmkl_intel_lp64.a /opt/intel/lib/libmkl_intel_lp64.a
